high_descs: Cross the room to the left and then turn to the left and face the lamp on the desk.
Pick the pencil up from the shelf above the computer on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Pick a pencil up and turn the lamp on.

high_descs: Walk over to the right side of the wooden desk to your left.
Pick up the pencil off of the middle shelf behind the desk.
Look down at the lamp on the desk.
Turn on the light of the small lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pencil in the light of a small lamp.

high_descs: Turn left, walk to the end of the bed, turn right, walk a few steps, turn left, walk to the wall, then turn left to face the desk.
Pick up the white pencil that is sitting on the shelf above the desk.
Lower the pencil down to the desk area.
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pencil using the light of a lamp.
